name: Oddworld: New 'n' Tasty: Deluxe Edition
summary: Includes the main 'Oddworld: New 'n' Tasty' game, the 'Alf's Escape' DLC and the 'Scrub Abe' costume DLC. Abe, the original Oddworld hero, faces ancient ruins, dodge carnivorous beasts and trigger-happy hunting parties in this lovingly recrafted take on classic Abe's Oddysee. Built from the ground up, get breathtaking visuals, enhanced audio and improved gameplay with New 'n' Tasty - the original Oddworld game using the latest next-gen technology.
